error.heading: Error
error.oops: Oops! It seems like an error has occured.
error.supportString: Please contact support if the problem persists.
error.mailToString:
Hello,
I stumbled upon an error in the Seatplan Generator. Here are the details:

errors.notEnoughDesks: There are not enough desks for all students. Some students will not have a desk assigned to them. Are you sure you want to continue?
errors.noDesk: Please add at least one desk in order to continue.
errors.removeAllStudents: You are about to delete all students. This action cannot be undone
errors.invalidShareData: Invalid seatplan data. Please verify your url and try again.
